name: The Wanted Illusionist
description:
Controls: A & D for left right, W/Space to jump (can wall jump), Left Click to attack, Right Click to turn on/off Focal Spell.

You are a bounty hunter. Your current target is an Illusionist, who is hiding in her castle. Inside, there are many traps and enemies standing in your way, and some of them are just illusions - or worse, invisible. With a special spell you learnt at the Magic Academy to help, can you conquer the castle and find the wanted Illusionist?

This is a small 2D platformer game created by me and Purrinya - my friend. It is for the Brackey's Game Jam. Hope you guys like it!
